ygData.msgSnippet: The clouds parted. As the two bots began thier futile attempt agaisnt Galvatron...A pod landed in a near by valley. Galvatron looked at it as it went by...

Subject: Megastrom
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

 The clouds parted. As the two bots began thier futile attempt agaisnt 
Galvatron...A pod landed in a near by valley. Galvatron looked at it as it 
went by... "Brother." He turned back to the fight and hand and waited for 
them to reach him...

   The pod landed. Unlike others he had a mode. A tank mode. He was known as 
the Duke of destruction. Second in command to Galvatron back on that dreaded 
planet. When his brother had been rebuilt his signal had benn picked up by 
Megastrom. He had to use his skills to help Magma defend agaisnt this for. He 
turned into his tank mode and rolled off towards the ship.
  Suddenly Galvatron's eyes glowed. "I dont think so brother. I am here to 
help the destrons not to rule them. My goal is second in command and to be 
his war general. That must be Apocalypse's ambition in me.  If you screw with 
me I will set off that destruct meckanizim I installed on you. Did you think 
I forgot?" he pulled out from the mind channel and returned to concertartion 
on the bots. Megastorm reached the destron base. "I am here to help you. Me 
and my brother Galvatron are here to win this war for you. He is off 
finishing his work."
